ActJudges Act
SubjectLeave of absence to the Hon. Louise Moreau
PrecisGranting of a further leave of absence to the Hon. LOUISE MOREAU, a judge of the Superior Court of Quebec, from April 23, 2013 to July 31, 2013, on account of ill-health.
AttachmentsAttachment
